emailsettings.subject: Work Authorization for new Task Order (TO) BB on ALPHA Enhancement contract - effective 01/01/19
emailsettings.html:
Attention: ${var4$

The ALPHA Enhancement Task Order (TO) BBBB contract was recently awarded, effective 01/01/19. You are authorized to support the following task(s) on TO BB using the Project ID(s) and PLC listed below. Please note that some tasks do not begin until 01/01/19.

If you have any questions about using the new project ID or your PLC Code, please contact me or the Project ID POC listed below.

Retain this authorization so that it can be produced later if requested by an auditor.

Thank you, ${var41$

${var7} ${var8} ${var9} ${var10} ${var11} ${var12} ${var13} ${var14} ${var15} ${var16} ${var17} ${var18} ${var19} ${var20} ${var21} ${var22} ${var23} ${var24} ${var25} ${var26} ${var27} ${var28} ${var29} ${var30} ${var31} ${var32} ${var33} ${var34} ${var35} ${var36} ${var37} ${var38} ${var39} ${var40}
